Text:
Shemyaza, thanks again for all your effort.

I was trying to understand about seeders/leechers, etc, and thought that after downloading your rugby games I needed to upload them (seeds?) so that it would benefit other downloaders. The files uploaded as new downloads so I removed them. Are there any protocols that we downloaders  need to abide by.
@thepotman: Yup, honour thy father and mother, stay in school, be kind to rodents and remember the other day and keep things chilly ;)
